summary: This is an email from an FBI Assistant General Counsel dated February 16, 2024, forwarding a complaint filed on February 14, 2024, by twelve Jane Does against the United States, alleging FBI negligence in relation to Jeffrey Epstein. The email indicates the FBI had not yet been formally served with the complaint.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The complaint referenced in the email alleges FBI negligence in relation to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Filing of Jane Doe Complaint
events.description: A complaint was filed by twelve Jane Does against the United States, alleging negligence by the FBI in relation to Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: 935 Pennsylvania Ave NW, Room 10140, Washington, DC 20535
keyFacts: A complaint was filed on February 14, 2024, by twelve Jane Does against the United States.
The complaint alleges negligence by the FBI in relation to Jeffrey Epstein.
The FBI's Office of the General Counsel was aware of the filing as of February 16, 2024, but had not yet been formally served.
